, I've been watching you. Your skills are impressive, but your weapon is sub-optimal.

Look at the weapon I just gave you. You'll just need a few items to enchant it.

Visit Valdrin in Lumbertown, and he'll give you what you need.

Enchanting, eh? I'll fill you in.

Enchant your equipment by combining it with feedstock of the same tier and some alkahestâ€”by the way, I sell that. Enchanting adds to the item's defense on armor, and offense on weapons. You can repeat the process to unlock bonuses at different levels.

To enchant equipment, you need to collect feedstock. You can do that by dismantling other gear of that tier. There's a button at the bottom of your inventory for dismantling gear.

You also need alkahest. Lots and lots of alkahest. Don't forget to buy some alkahest.
